name: df-pell1234qr
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cpell1234qr, cmpt(s0, cdif(cn, csquarenn), crab(s1, cr, wrex(s2, cz, wrex(s3, cz, wa(wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s2), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s3)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s3), cexp, nat2))), nat1)))))))
comment: Define the general solutions of a Pell equation. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Sep-2014.)
